article.t: 'Tully,' 'Overboard' track: Charlize Theron shines while Luc Besson sinks in two low-key albums released between blockbusters
article.d: 'Clay,' 'Overboard' soundtrack: Charlize Theron shines in Kevin Hart and Kevin Hart's latest video, while Luc Besson and Hayley Erin sink in tired remake
